venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest -- Equestrian Parking Lot (#3)

item.description:
Join DCR Park Interpreter Dick on a hike through the wild western part of Myles Standish State Forest.

This hike is about 3 to 4 miles in length and takes about 2 hours. Please bring bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes. Bring along water and a snack.

We’ll meet at the Equestrian Parking Lot (Parking lot #3 on the park map) which is about 1/4 mile in from a marked turn off Lower College Pond Road about a mile north of the Park Headquarters.


Join us for breakfast at Metro's Cafe on 3A in Manomet at 7:30 if you are interested. All are welcome and the $2.95 Early Bird Special is a deal.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Off The Beaten Path Hike: Horsing around
